data.name: In The Valley of Death -Prologue-
data.detailed_description:
In the Valley of Death is a color-based hack, slash, and dash twin-stick shooter in a top-down perspective that follows the adventures of Red and Blue as they battle their way through hordes of enemies and attempt to make their way to the Valley of Death.

In the Valley of Death features a unique set of mechanics where the player controls Red and Blue, each character having their set of abilities, as they fight their way through colored enemies, where each enemy is vulnerable to a weapon with the same color they have, providing players with a unique challenge as they venture further into the game.

Unique Gun, Slash, and Dash Gameplay Mechanic

Hectic High Intensity Fights.

A Challenging World That Will Test Your Skills.

In the Valley of Death features a unique set of mechanics where the player controls Red and Blue, each character having their set of abilities, as they fight their way through colored enemies, where each enemy is vulnerable to a weapon with the same color they have, providing players with a unique challenge as they venture further into the game.

Unique Gun, Slash, and Dash Gameplay Mechanic

data.short_description: In the Valley of Death is a color-based hack and slash twin-stick shooter, where the player controls Red and Blue as they dash, slash, and shoot their way through challenging levels as they attempt to make it to the Valley of Death.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5+ Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with at least 1GB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8+ Ghz
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with at least 1GB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
